Properties

CGLineCap lineCap
 Sets the style for the endpoints of lines drawn in a graphics context.
CGLineJoin lineJoin
 Sets the style for the joins of connected lines in a graphics context.
CGFloat miterLimit
 Sets the miter limit for the joins of connected lines in a graphics context.
CGFloat lineWidth
 Sets the line width for a graphics context.
NSArray * dashPattern
 The dash-and-space pattern for the line.
CGFloat patternPhase
 Sets the starting phase of the line dash pattern.
CPColor * lineColor
 Sets the current stroke color in a context.

Detailed Description

Wrapper for various line drawing properties.

See also:
See Apple's Quartz 2D and CGContext documentation for more information about each of these properties.
